Delegation of DPRK Foreign Ministry Leaves for China
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Foreign Ministry Leaves for China  
   Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry headed by its Vice-Minister Kim Yong Il left here today to visit China.
